biocontainers.name: telescoper
biocontainers.summary: De novo assembly of highly repetitive regions

biotools.summary: A local assembly algorithm designed for short-reads from NGS platforms such as Illumina. The reads must come from two libraries: one short insert, and one long insert.

bioschemas.name: Telescoper
bioschemas.summary: A local assembly algorithm designed for short-reads from NGS platforms such as Illumina. The reads must come from two libraries: one short insert, and one long insert.
